ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Crowd control and lament pulling (was grouping thread on the Ever quest boards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for posting this - stupid me forgot you could have a hot key with multiple commands (D uh).  Been struggling with this for so many levels I m
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for posting this - stupid me forgot you could have a hot key with
multiple commands (D'uh). Been struggling with this for so many levels I'm
embarrassed.

Slyde Katzenjammer
So close to 45 I can smell it

Unable to play due to DSL Line Problems (ARRRG)

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 8:51 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Crowd control and lament pulling (was grouping
thread on the Ever quest boards)


How to get your pet to attack what the party is beating on:

Hot Key "Assist"
/g I'm so darn charming!
/assist <tank name>
/pet attack
